name: MysteryVibe
description:
MysteryVibe creates award-winning Sexual Health Products. Deeply researched, anatomically designed, doctor-endorsed products to make intimacy easy. Our vision is to create a world where everyone has the space, freedom, knowledge & power to elevate their sexual health & wellbeing.

WE RESEARCH, WE INVENT We invent category defining products that combine the best of humanity & technology to create the ultimate personalised pleasure experience. Our tech is patented and proven. Our products are the most certified, award winning and loved out there.

WE CHALLENGE THE STATUS QUO We want to make sexual health as commonplace as ... health. So anyone from post-natal to post-menopause; adventurer to ED solver; singles to long-term couples, can use our tools, talks & techniques to bring that mystery back into their bedrooms.

WE MAKE THINGS PERSONAL We believe that understanding our pleasure is the key to unlocking our progress. As individuals, within relationships and as a society.

team.name: Shanshan Xu
team.bioHtml:
Co-Founder of Mucho
Founding Member of MysteryVibe

team.name: Soumyadip Rakshit
team.bioHtml: Founder @MysteryVibe • Worked at @Deloitte Consulting, @Canon, @Philips • Studied at @University of Bath

team.name: Stephanie Alys
team.bioHtml: Founder NewCo (in stealth) • Previously founded @MysteryVibe •

jobs.title: Customer Support Intern @ Award-winning Sexual Health Brand
jobs.description:
MysteryVibe creates award-winning Sexual Health Products. Deeply researched, anatomically designed, doctor-endorsed products to make intimacy easy. Our vision is to create a world where everyone has the space, freedom, knowledge & power to elevate their sexual health & wellbeing.

The Role:

The Customer Support Intern will be responsible for all things customer at a very exciting stage of our company, as we scale the business and release our third product.

 + Become an expert on all of MysteryVibe’s products and services and help our customers understand the features, benefits and how to get the most out of the entire customer processes
 + Manage the questions/issues facing our customers through our customer support platform, email and/or Skype
 + Process orders, forms, and requests and own feedback capture to support decisions around future product and services
 + Run the day-to-day operations around customer support, logistics and inventory management for both our B2C and B2B channels
 + Own the FAQs and take a methodical approach to regularly updating the database of customer Q&A
 + Own customer reviews and execute upon the strategy to grow reviews across all public facing sites with ratings on MysteryVibe
 + Support the creation of assets for partnerships and sales
 + Constantly improving and optimizing the client support in collaboration with the Partnerships Manager

Who you are:
 + High level of attention to detail and structure
 + A great communicator and people person with an infectious enthusiasm for customer happiness
 + Highly driven and ambitious, naturally collaborative who excels as part of a team
 + Motivated self-starter with an entrepreneurial mindset
 + Mac literate, with excellent knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite, especially Photoshop & Illustrator
 + Deeply analytical and highly proficient at Excel and other MS Office products
 + Adaptable, working well in a constantly changing environment
 + Personally motivated by our mission to make sexual health mainstream

What we offer
 + Exposure to various aspects of a rapidly growing business
 + A collaborative, flexible and friendly environment
 + Unlimited fruits and snacks + Monday breakfasts + Monthly dinners
 + Best coffee in town from Change Please
 + Daily health, fitness & meditation classes
 + Personal development events
 + Corporate discounts
 + Free tampons and breastfeeding room
